import React from 'react'; import { FormattedMessage } from "react-intl"; import ReactQuill from "react-quill"; import "react-quill/dist/quill.snow.css"; import Layout from '../../Common/Component/Layout'; import prevArrowIcon from "../../Image/challenge-prev-arrow-icon.svg"; import nextArrowIcon from "../../Image/challenge-next-arrow-icon.svg"; import "./index.scss"; export default function View(props) { const { challengeItem, onClickPrev, onClickNext, onClickList, onClickPlay } = props; if(!challengeItem) { return (
); } return (

{challengeItem.productTitle}

{challengeItem.teamName}

{challengeItem.teamDescription}

 ) }
